description:
Join us for a bit of intrepid fun with a game Andy has just made up called 'Kaotic Kanban'. You'll probably be the first group to experience this so there'll be a bit of trial and error and a forgiving approach to the session.

Expect high levels of audience participation, collaboration and the odd joke or two.

Please note: This will be an in-person event in central Bristol with no remote facilities

About the speaker:
Realising he's been doing Product Development with Agile teams for nearly 20 years, Andy has been there, done that and worn the t-shirt several times over. Still learning new things and working with teams of awesome people, Andy is the author of Applying Scrum With Kanban, a book that is definitely not pointless!
title: Kaotic Kanban  with Andy Hiles
